meanings.definition: A type of evergreen tree native to the Mediterranean region.
meanings.sent1: The madrono tree stays green all year round.
meanings.sent2: In the Mediterranean, you can find the madrono tree growing in abundance.
meanings.sent3: The madrono tree decided to throw a party for the other trees in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The madrono tree stood tall like a guardian of the Mediterranean region.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the madrono tree filled the air with freshness.

meanings.definition: The fruit of the madrono tree, similar to a strawberry.
meanings.sent1: I picked a ripe madrono from the tree and savored its sweetness.
meanings.sent2: The madrono fruit is a delightful treat enjoyed by many.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a madrono and ran off with it.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as sweet as the taste of a madrono fruit.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red color of the madrono fruit caught my eye in the forest.
